items.sentence: Tom just barely managed to earn enough money to pay the rent.
I just wanted to let you know I\'ll be late tomorrow morning.
I make it a rule not to watch television after nine o\'clock.
I hear that Tom Jackson is one of the best lawyers in Boston.
I hope you know that the last thing I want to do is hurt you.
I hope you know the last thing that I want to do is hurt you.
I just find it hard to believe that Tom really believes that.
I was trying to say something when you so rudely interrupted.
I wish I could figure out how to disable comments on my blog.
Tom doesn\'t speak much, but when he does, everybody listens.
